data.name: NA3001
data.value: The 'todir' should be set when using the <assemblies> element to specify the list of PE files to disassemble.
data.comment: The 'todir' should be set when using the <assemblies> element to specify the list of PE files to disassemble.

data.name: NA3002
data.value: The 'input' attribute and the <assemblies> element cannot be combined.
data.comment: The 'input' attribute and the <assemblies> element cannot be combined.

data.name: NA3003
data.value: Either the 'output' or 'todir' attribute should be set.
data.comment: Either the 'output' or 'todir' attribute should be set.

data.name: NA3004
data.value: The 'output' and 'todir' attribute cannot both be set.
data.comment: The 'output' and 'todir' attribute cannot both be set.

data.name: NA3006
data.value: The output file for '{0}' could not be determined.
data.comment: The output file for '{0}' could not be determined.

data.name: NA3010
data.value: Cannot pause service {0} on computer '{1}' as its not currently started.
data.comment: Cannot pause service {0} on computer '{1}' as its not currently started.

data.name: NA3011
data.value: Cannot pause service {0} on computer '{1}' as it does not support the pause and continue mechanism.
data.comment: Cannot pause service {0} on computer '{1}' as it does not support the pause and continue mechanism.

data.name: NA3013
data.value: Cannot continue service {0} on computer '{1} as its not currently started.
data.comment: Cannot continue service {0} on computer '{1} as its not currently started.

data.name: NA3014
data.value: Cannot continue service {0} on computer '{1} as it does not support the pause and continue mechanism.
data.comment: Cannot continue service {0} on computer '{1} as it does not support the pause and continue mechanism.

data.name: NA3015
data.value: Cannot continue service {0} on computer '{1} as its not currently running or paused.
data.comment: Cannot continue service {0} on computer '{1} as its not currently running or paused.

data.name: String_OutputFileDoesNotExist
data.value: Output file '{0}' does not exist, disassembling.
data.comment: Output file '{0}' does not exist, disassembling.
